snippet.title: LoveSick Darlings Overview Trailer - Coming Soon!
snippet.description:
The updated official trailer for LoveSick Darlings! I hope you enjoy watching it!

You can go and try the FREE demo for the game RIGHT NOW!! It's six hours long and covers nearly half the full game! If you liked it, don't forget to wishlist the full version of LoveSick Darlings too!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1151410/LoveSick_Darlings/

Trailer by Shiki: https://twitter.com/shikimatsuri

Follow the game on Itch, and try the demo here if you prefer:
https://biolizard.itch.io/lovesickdarlings

Follow the project on Twitter for all the latest!: https://twitter.com/LoveSickDarling

About the project:
LoveSick Darlings is a visual novel focused on developing and testing the limits of teenage relationships. It explores friendship, youth, love, and everything in between. The game plays with tropes and expectations found in romantic visual novels and dating sims by undercutting this often-romanticized period of everyone's lives with a realistic edge.

LoveSick Darlings is looking to launch on Steam and itch.io as soon as it's ready!

Thanks to the support of over 300 generous backers, LoveSick Darlings raised roughly $6000 USD to make this game a reality on January 3rd, 2020. Thank you to each and every backer who helped make this game a reality. This wouldn't exist without them.

Follow the project on Kickstarter for all the latest news and monthly updates!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lovesickdarlings/lovesick-darlings-a-visual-novel-with-consequences
